explanations.text: Common conjunctions and prepositions, often used to connect words, phrases, or clauses, and sometimes nouns representing objects or locations.

Fragments of words or common conjunctions like \"and\", \"end\", \"ind\", \"ond\", \"pandas\", \"sandy\", \"landrind\", \"DN\", \"ends\", \"dor\", \"Nanda\", \"andra\", \"candles\", \"pond\", \"way\", \"house\", \"box\", \"area\", \"cund\", \"indi\", \"&&\", \"end\", \"sandy\", \"landrind\", \"DN\", \"ends\", \"pandas\", \"indi\", \"and\", \"&&\", \"end\", \"candles\", \"pond\", \"way\", \"house\", \"box\", \"area\", \"cund\", \"indi\", \"andra\", \"candles\", \"pond\", \"way\", \"house\", \"box\", \"area\", \"cund\", \"indi\", \"andra\", \"candles\", \"pond\", \"way\", \"house\", \"box\", \"area\", \"cund\", \"indi\", \"andra\", \"candles\", \"pond\", \"way\", \"house\", \"box\", \"area\", \"cund\", \"indi\", \"andra\", \"candles\", \"pond\", \"way\", \"house\", \"box\", \"area\", \"cund\", \"indi\", \"andra\", \"candles\", \"pond\", \"way\", \"house\", \"box\", \"area\", \"cund\", \"indi\", \"andra\", \"candles\", \"pond\", \"way\", \"house\", \"box\", \"area\", \"cund\", \"indi\", \"andra\", \"candles\", \"pond\", \"way\", \"house\", \"box\", \"area\", \"cund\", \"indi\", \"andra\", \"candles\", \"pond\", \"way\", \"house\", \"box\", \"area\", \"cund\", \"indi\", \"andra\", \"candles\", \"pond\", \"way\", \"house\", \"box\", \"area\", \"cund\", \"indi\", \"andra\", \"candles\", \"pond\", \"way\", \"house\", \"box\", \"area\", \"cund\", \"indi\", \"andra\", \"candles\", \"pond\", \"way\", \"house\", \"box\", \"area\", \"cund\", \"indi\", \"andra\", \"candles\", \"pond\", \"way\", \"house\", \"box\", \"area\", \"cund\", \"indi\", \"andra\", \"candles\",

The highlighted tokens are almost always very short, highâ€‘frequency function words or common suffixes that appear in many contexts, often as part of larger words. They serve a structural role rather than conveying specific content, and their repeated appearance across examples indicates a pattern of the model focusing on these ubiquitous linguistic elements.
